external_games.name: Supra Binyot Lande 2: Melpert's Quest for Booti

name: Supra Binyot Lande 2: Melpert's Quest for Booti
storyline: Melpert's friend Gnorp has been kidnapped, and he must find treasure to pay for his ransom. He heads to a treasure island, but the quest will not be so simple...
summary: In this sequel to the 2019 Vinesauce fangame Supra Binyot Lande, Melpert must platform his way through 10 levels and battle bosses in order to find enough treasure to pay off the ransom to save his friend Gnorp. He will find upgrades to assist him, such as Monster cans or Dark Souls.
